tools.label: BioFabric
tools.description: BioFabric is a network visualization tool that uses a novel presentation method where nodes are represented using horizontal line segments.

tools.label: GeneSpot
tools.description: This tool provides a way to view a TCGA data from a gene-centric point-of-view.  It includes a number of interactive visualizations, and allows the user to save their current exploration.  This application also enables the user to select specific cancers and genes of interest, and load data that is generated from a variety of TCGA analysis.

tools.label: Regulome Explorer
tools.description: This web-based tool provides for the exploration of data from TCGA. It can be used to explore common gene disruptions across different cancers and associations among heterogeneous measurements (e.g., gene expression, methylation, copy number variation, clinical)

tools.label: Pubcrawl
tools.description: Pubcrawl is an interactive web application that generates normalized medline distances for terms, and then returns a network topology based on the term distances and protein domain interactions.

tools.label: Dodoma
tools.description: DoDoMa is a tool that automatically identifies transcription factors with matching DNA binding domains, and returns all associated position weight matrix (PWM).

tools.label: Golem
tools.description: Golem (Go Launch on Every Machine) is a light weight system for distributing analysis across processes and machines using web technologies and core features of the Go language.

tools.label: RF-ACE
tools.description: RF-ACE is an efficient implementation of a robust machine learning algorithm for uncovering multivariate associations from large and diverse data sets.

tools.label: Fastbreak
tools.description: Fastbreak is a set of python scripts implementing an O(n) algorithm for detecting translocations and other genetic structural variants from aligned mate pair sequence data in SAM/BAM format.

tools.label: VisQuick
tools.description: VisQuick is a Javascript library utilizing the Protovis project to provide configurable, interactive, informative data exploration tools.

tools.label: EPEPT
tools.description: A web service for enhanced P-value estimation in permutation tests

tools.label: Addama
tools.description: The Adaptive Data Management Service Architecture provides web applications and services, and defines REST APIs to facilitate rapid application development.

tools.label: ProbTF
tools.description: ProbTF is a web server that enables the analysis of DNA sequences using mouse-specific position weight matrices from the TRANSFAC™ database.

tools.label: BioTapestry
tools.description: BioTapestry is an interactive tool for building, visualizing, and simulating genetic regulatory networks.

tools.label: Cytoscape
tools.description: Cytoscape is an open source bioinformatics software platform for visualizing molecular interaction networks and integrating these interactions with gene expression profiles and other state data.

tools.label: Lichen
tools.description: Lichen provides a set of Flash visualizations designed to be easily incorporated as figures and user interface elements in scientific databases or web applications.

tools.label: MotifMogul
tools.description: Web service that enables the analysis of multiple DNA sequences using sets of Position Weight Matrices from the JASPAR and TRANSFAC™ databases, using multiple scanning algorithms.

tools.label: Innate Immune Database (IIDB)
tools.description: The Innate Immune Database (IIDB) is a repository of genomic annotations and experimental data for over 2000 genes associated with immune response behavior in the mouse genome.

tools.label: ISB Java
tools.description: This project is a library (collection) of classes written in the Java programming language, that are intended to be used for research in computational biology.

tools.label: SimCluster
tools.description: Simcluster is a package for clustering analysis of transcript enumeration data on the simplex space.

tools.label: ProbCD
tools.description: ProbCD is a R package for Probabilistic Categorical Data analysis. ProbCD calculates the statistical association (correlation is one type of association measurement) between the properties encoded in the rows and columns of a k x 2 contingency table in which there is uncertainty in placing each element in any of the 2k possible table cells.

tools.label: AngioQuant
tools.description: AngioQuant is an automated image analysis tool for quantification of angiogenesis. It is designed for in vitro angiogenesis assays that are based on co-culturing endothelial cells with fibroblasts.

tools.label: Dizzy
tools.description: Dizzy is a chemical kinetics stochastic simulation software package written in Java. It provides a model definition environment and an implementation of the Gillespie, Gibson-Bruck, and Tau-Leap stochastic algorithms.
